You can also use this as a moisturizer, I've tried it and it does leave my skin VERY soft.

Update: February 2012 I told my friend about how to use this product for cooking and how it was helpful for weight loss result - May 2012 she has lost 2 dress sizes and she has more energy. Before this she was not able to successfully lose the weight.

Nutiva Organic extra virgin (actually in the field of coconut oil there is no distinction between virgin and extra virgin like the grades of olive oil)is the best coconut oil brand for quality due to its true essence of coconut flavor. This is one of the very few companies that keep with the tradition of producing it cold pressed by hand which allows the oil to maintain all of its nutritional benefits. It's not an over powering oil. It has a clean, tropical, nutty scent and delicate flavor.

It is good for baking, sauteeing, frying, for smoothies, spreadable on bread/pancakes, great for creating frosting, and making dipping chocolate or added with chocolate for fondue, taken orally for weight loss, lip gloss, hot oil treatment for hair, hair dress, massage oil, skin moisturizer, nail/cuticle conditioner, make up remover, a combatant for vaginal/infections due to coconut's antiviral properties, used to moisten the inner nasal membrane to protect against dryness, and great (especially when combined with olive oil)for making bars of soap.

Coconut oil is extremely beneficial for your health because it has both short and medium chain fatty acids which promotes weight loss, increased metabolism, and healthy skin. Many experience the lowering of bad cholestorol while consuming.

It is the secret ingredient I use for sauteeing broccoli and cauliflower with a hint of ginger and nutmeg. I use it for salmon, lamb, chicken, eggs (yum), and it brings out such a dimension to food. I prefer it to butter and olive oil in cooking when I have it on hand. My cakes, brownies, quick breads turn out moister with coconut oil and rise better. Because it liquifies beyond 72degress F it may be necessary to combine coconut oil with a heavier fat (such as butter) when baking cookies.

Due to it's properties, coconut oil absorbs nicely into one's hair to soften it and combat frizziness. After trying other brands of coconut oil, none has compared to the remarkable pureness and flavor of Nutiva.

I haven't tried cooking with this oil yet. I use it for my hair mixed with shea butter or alone. I wish there was a more coconut smell, but this is how it smells naturally. I add a little coconut essential oil to help it out. Melts quickly, mixes well with other things and it's greasy feeling on the hair.

I recommend waiting until the price goes down to $15 and under, sometimes it goes up to over $20.

WHY WHY WHY are you discontinuing my shipments of coconut oil???? It says no longer available, yet I can REBUY it at twice the price???? This is ridiculous, unacceptable, and poor business practice!!!! Please reinstate the deal I got on this product. Love the oil....hate that you're ripping us off now!!!

I just heard about this product a few weeks ago. My wife and I are using it every day and have felt the difference. We also give it to our golden retriever and it has cleared up her yeast infection and her coat looks great. I used it on my dry scalp and that is gone now. It smells good but there is no taste of coconut. Give it a try,you will love it.

This is my favorite, hands-down, brand of coconut oil. I use it in cooking...fave is to melt some on a piece of foil, toss sweet potato fries or tots in it and bake then sprinkle on some coarse salt. Yum! I have also used this on my toddler's tush when it gets pink from food related sensitivities... it'll clear up overnight. I'll use it on my skin, my hair, anywhere! Taste great, smells great. A+
I bought this product to help condition my hair, and it works great!  As for cooking with it, have not tried it yet, but it does smell awesome!

This is my 3rd shipment that I received from Amazon and I have grown to love the product.  I use in on my skin and found that even when applied it does not leave your skin with a greasy residue.  It evaporates quickly but still keep your skin moisturized all day if applied right after showering. I purchased this product to moisturize the back area since I drive long distance every day.  It did the job by healing that troubled spot and with continuous use, the problem area is no longer there.  I also use this product in my natural thinning hair and I have found that my hair is becoming much thicker. I will continue to use this product as long as the price of the product does not increase dramatically.  I have also given away some of the product to family members who are requesting more from me.  To their surprise, I have told them that Amazon offers the best deal and they should purchase the product on this own.  Love it and will keep using it throughout the changing of the seasons.

This stuff "Nutiva Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil, 15-Ounce Tubs (Pack of 2)" works for EVERYTHING!

You can cook with it, use it as a softener on your skin, put it in your hair as a conditioner, use it in place of butter on toast...the list goes on and on!

I say "try it, I'm positive you'll like it"!!! :)

"Product arrived quickly, packaged well. Love the taste- Fresh, clean. Used mostly as spread or topping, used few times for frying- fantastic! Have used another brand of oil (more expensive) and it seems to have less taste and Aroma.  Purchased this brand again, no hesitation. Good product, reliable seller/shipping."

I absolutely love this coconut oil. It is delicious in oatmeal and I even use it in my coffee (I used to use coconut creamer). I put some in a small jar and use it for moisturizer at night. My niece uses it instead of Desitin on my great-nephew.

Coconut oil is very good for you (internally and externally) and this particular coconut oil is highly recommended.

Summary: Clear skin after 30 years of acne
Text:
Don't overlook this product's antibacterial properties. I cringe when I think of the years I used antiseptic, drying cleansers on my skin for acne, when coconut oil cleared my skin and has kept it clear and healthy for almost a year. It is good for almost any kind of skin irritation, even for pets. It cleared up my cat's skin irritation from flea allergies, and we got to skip a trip to the vet.
Great to cook with too, or add to tea or oatmeal.

After doing ALOT of research I decided to purchase this Coconut Oil. I'm happy that I did. Thus far, i'm very happy with the purchase. Just a word of advice. If you are going to ingest the Coconut Oil, go to 'Youtube' and do a Search for 'Green Regimen'. This is a Green Smoothie video blog and I put my Coconut Oil in these Smoothies. It's working out GREATLY. Good Luck!!!
I don't use it for cooking but I use it for eye makeup remover, lotion on my body and also hair mask.
Great oil. Use it with eggs, stir fry, even in smoothies! Quick shipping. Buy it....coconut oil is super good for you!

I've gone through three little tubs of EVCO, now, and it's great. I use it in place of vegetable oils and butter (or part of the butter) in baking, and the results have been very tasty.

The coconut flavor is light but present, so that's something to keep in mind. Some people swear you can't taste the coconut, others say it overwhelming the base recipe. So far, in cakes, breads, and a few candies, the flavor has been complimentary. I like it.

As well, it is a tad sweet, so I adjust the sweetener in my recipes down a bit more than usual.

I live in a climate that is warm for most of the year, so the EVCO stays liquid. Though it is shelf-stable, it may be worth considering how you would need to store it, based on your climate, before you buy. This particular container size is very manageable to handle on the shelf, and it doesn't take up a lot of room in the fridge.

I'm really happy with this product. I plan to have it as a pantry staple for all of my baking.
This is a wonderful product for my new Paleo lifestyle.  Many coconut oils on the market, this one is superior!

Nutiva does not make a bad product. I eat a strict Paleo eating regimen coconut oil is all I use for baking; well sometimes Ghee. I brush coconut oil on chicken breasts, sprinkle some hemp seeds on top, a bit of black pepper and then bake. The coconut flavor is not overwhelming it just sneaks in there. I also use coconut oil when I saute my spinach; also adding black pepper and hemp seeds. I am finding this the new oil in my life I really enjoy it.

Summary: I use this instead of butter.
Text: I will admit I love coconut. This oil gives the slightest hint of coconut flavor. I use it to cook eggs and when I make rice. According to the newest medical information this oil is good for you.
LOVE THIS STUFF! SO MUCH HEALTHIER THAN COOKING WITH BUTTER. DELICIOUS. LOVE THE COCONUT AROMA. NOT TOO STRONG IN TASTE OR SMELL. ALSO GREAT FOR SKIN AND HAIR!

I love this product and use it on both my babies daily...
Great for dry skin and eczema
Smells great

I love this coconut oil! I use it for so many things. Baking, body lotion, make-up remover, instead of olive oil, to make hot tea..
Endless uses plus it is so healty!

Summary: It's now a staple for me
Text: I ordered this oil because I was looking for an organic cold pressed coconut oil and this fit the bill and had a lot of good reviews. I use this oil for my hair and skin and plan to try it for cooking which is why I bought a two pack - one for my bedroom and the other for the kitchen. I use this oil everyday and my first jar has lasted for months. I have used it instead of lotion and as a deep conditioner and a daily conditioner. My hair loves it and it creates nice shine and my skin loves it especially in winter time when its dry. I have already ordered a big jar in preparation for me running out since it is a staple for me now. I love that I am not rubbing chemicals on my body but a natural substance.
This oil is just awesome! You can cook with it and its great on the skin. it has many uses and the smell is mild not overpowering. I highly recommend it!

I bought this oil specifically for use in my soap making process. I wasn't looking to use it for cooking purposes. All I can say is that it smells nice. It made my soap more leathery with a nice under scent. I will appreciate a bigger jar. It might be economical getting it in a big jar or bottle.

I love coconut oil. I use it for keto cooking (go coconut oil chocolates!) and as a moisturizer on my body, face, and hair--basically everywhere. My skin is soooo soft and a few scars have faded even. I use it around my eyes and on my lips especially. Absorbs really fast unlike a lot of store processed body oil products! (Pure coconut oil is cheaper anyway!)

Maybe TMI but it also helps improves my digestion. Some coconut oils are odorless but this particular brand has a light and pleasant coconut smell. I love it and use it all the time.

product arrived extremely fast, i think < 2 days from when i placed my order
this was my first coconut oil purchase. i love that you get two smaller containers so you can leave one sealed.
fresh and light color. I do get a coconut smell but don't feel that it is a "strong" smell at all.
have used it to make stir fry veggies and it was very good!
also giving it to my cats to aid their coats and weight control (any info/suggestions on pet uses welcome!) =)

Love this product. I have an esophagus and stomach illness and can't use butter or margarine. This is a wonderful option. Works great with toast, baking, or pan frying. Has a very slight sweet taste. My husband says he notices no difference in taste.

Summary: Add to my smoothie every morning!
Text: Some coconut oils have distinct flavor. This one is light but very tasty. I add a tablespoon to my green smoothie for healthy fats and energy. I have been using for about a year now and have never been healthier!  My recipe. Coconut Water as the base, 2 cups spinach, TBSP Coconut Oil, TBSP Chia Seeds, TBSP Hemp Seeds for protein, some fruit like bananas or frozen berries etc. I also cook with it because it is the ONLY oil that can be heated to 350 without converting to trans fats.

I am in love with this product. It is awesome. I use it as a hair treatment and a moisturizer. Sometimes I'll put it in my hair after shampooing it, wrap it in plastic and leave it in overnite. Other times I just run a handful thru my hair at the end of the day and leave it on for a few hours and then wash it out. Either way, I end up with the softest and shiniest hair.

I also use it to moisturize my skin. Rub it on at night and wake up to soft, non greasy skin. Rub it on your legs in the shower and use it a shaving lotion. You wont believe how well it works.

Cant recommend this product enough. Its non greasy, works its way into your skin overnite and leaves no residue, and has just a slight, but pleasant smell.

Summary: This is it! Tastes good and smells good too!
Text:
Just felt compelled to chime in with others who praise this product. This coconut oil tastes good and smells good too. Might want to go to the Nutiva website and/or get educated on coconut oil in general to discover why this product is so unique/good. But that won't equate to excellent experience of actually using it.

ALL COCONUT OILS ARE NOT EQUAL! This is a superior brand & product for many reasons.

PS: I'm getting it from another retailer (sorry Amazon - still love you tho, please forgive)

We get Nutiva Organic EV coconut oil on a two month subscription. It's great. I like to mix a serving of pistachios, a serving of almonds, and a tbsp of oil together for a late evening treat. My wife makes a great low carb snack by heating equal parts oil, semisweet chocolate chips, and chopped nuts; puts them in cupcake molds and freezes. Delicious but remember coconut oil melts easily (I just pop the whole thing in my mouth).

We "subscribe and save" this item. Can't beat the price or convenience. We use it with cooking eggs, vegetables, chicken. I even put a little in my coffee! Really mild smell and taste. Not coconut-y at all.

I've become a CO fanatic and this is my third Nutiva shipment. This CO is of excellent quality, slightly coconutty taste but nothing overwhelming, arrives fast and is an incredible deal. If you don't know about the benes of CO- read up. I drink it in my coffee in the morning and it really helps with satiety and weight loss.
I think it has a great taste and seems to be a good price for the product, check it out.
Really like this stuff and very benificial. It does work well in oriental and certain dishes. It has a slightly sweet/coconut flavor that doesn't add to the flavor of some items .

Since I started cooking with coconut oil 2 months ago this is the first brand/variety I've purchased that actually smelled and tasted like coconuts. The smell is amazing. Nutty and warm. It does infuse the food you're cooking with it with a slight flavor of coconut too. I am so glad we bought the Pack of 2 because it it is a winner. Other brands we've bought before are Jarrow (also avialable on Amazon) and Spectrum (from the grocerty store). Jarrow is a good quality brand but it did not have the same smell or flavor as the Nutiva. Spectrum, I learned after I bought it, is not great quality.

I'm planning to use it to make my own "Magic Shell" chocolate topping for our annual homemade Labor Day ice cream.

I highly reccomend this product for use in the kitchen or for the body!
Perfect for a moisturizer, has spf 4. I use on my lips when they are chapped. & after shaving my legs use as well.

Delicious, smooth and tasty addition to many foods. Increasing research shows the medium chain triglycerides in coconut oil stimulates the thyroid and juices up the metabolism. So, if you love the taste of coconut this is the one to buy!!

Summary: Great Price on a great product!
Text: This is a great deal on this coconut oil. On autoship I pay about half what I would pay elsewhere for the same product.  I like to keep 2 jars on hand. One in the kitchen for cooking, and one in the bathroom because it is a great face and body moisturizer, and deep conditioner for hair. Only disappointment is that the jar is plastic and the product is not completely raw.

This is my third brand of raw/unfiltered (or extra virgin as it is called here...same thing), and i am very satisfied. It is cold pressed and high quality, so the flavor, consistency, and aroma are all very nice. The price is also excellent. Highly recommended.

If you are not yet familiar with the incredible health benefits of raw coconut oil, i urge you to run a quick online search...you'll never go back to canola or fake butter cooking sprays again.

I love this product!  It has done wonders for my skin, yes I use it on my skin.  As I have gotten older my skin has gotten very dry, baby oil did not even work.  My friend suggested I use Coconut oil, I was shocked at the end of the day my skin did not have that "ash" look.....I highly recommend this for use on your skin!

Summary: The only coconut oil I buy!
Text:
Nutvia Organic Coconut Oil is the only coconut oil I will buy. Period! It is smooth when melted (no bits of coconut in it like I've experienced with other brands), making it perfect for stir-frying veggies and meat, or cooking up some eggs. I keep one jar in the refrigerator when I need it in a solid state, and one on the counter for when I need a liquid. I also use this product in my hair and it is fantastic!

The fact that this product comes in a two-pack is very convenient and cost-savvy!
Using it for cooking, hair repair and skin moisturizer. Love the smell, really great! Good product and price.  Will purchase again.

Summary: Best coconut oil buy for your dollar
Text: I have ordered this product numerous times and will continue to do so. This is by far the best price for pure organic coconut oil. I use it for everything cooking, hair, nails and skin.

This is a very tasty coconut oil at a very good price.  I've bought several different brands of coconut oil at Healthfood Stores at a much inflated price that weren't nearly as good tasting.  This one has a fresh, delicate coconut taste that is even good on salads.  I use it to fry fish & chicken and to oil casserole dishes too.
It smells really good and works better than I expected for cooking. You can use this for many things. Great for hair, skin and cooking.
Great conditioner for hair dont use alot though it will get oily just a little goes a long way my daughters are mixed and it makes their hair super soft and shiny!

Our family uses this coconut oil for a ton of things: baking, popcorn, in our coffee, hair -frizz tammer, body lotion, zit reducer, mixed with other stuff for deo, face wash, strech mark reducer, lip balm...and on and on. The price is great, cheaper then non-organic stuff from local store and it smells great!

I just love this product!!! I really like the fact that it comes in a 2 pack, I use one for cooking and have labeled the other "NFC", not for cooking. This is my new beauty product. I use it nightly as my moisturizer and have noticed that my skin is softer and my lines are less noticable. Even though it's oil, it doesn't make me break out (I tend to have oily skin) and I have rosacea, so I like the fact that it's natural. I've also used it as a deep conditioner on my hair with positive results. The smell is intoxicating, but not overwhelming, reminds me of Hawaii. It's great on any body part that is dry, feet especially. I even got my Mom on board, who has overly sensitive skin and she really likes it as well. Very happy that I found Nutiva.
The price is reasonable, it was well packed, and the product overall is just great. The flavor is delicious, too -- not too strong, but truly tasty.

This is one of the easiest coconut oils to cook and bake with. The taste is not very strong so that you can cook non dessert like food with it as well.  I use it for almost everything. Food, skin, hair etc.

I bought this product for my hair because of other people's reviews.  My hair was brittle and looked horrible because I color it often and use a flat iron almost daily.  I started using this product and my hair looks youthful and shiny again.  I have paid hundreds of dollars on conditioners and nothing worked better than coconut oil.  Love the fact that you get two of these, its a great deal!
This is the absolute finest oil for baking...also great on the skin. Bye-bye, canola oil and genetically modified oils! Put me on automatic delivery !
Every morning, w/o fail, after washing my face, I apply this coconut oil from forehead to neck.  Love the way it feels on my skin.
This product has great flavor on toast, although I haven't tried cooking with it yet.  Just wish it would not melt at 76 degrees. I guess it's just a mental thing!

I bought this for the purpose of hair and skin care, but Oh My it smells so good I had to taste it. I don't know much about coconut recipes, but I'll consider learning in order to put this to more extensive use.

Like most of the other reviews state, you can use this product for just about anything. Cooking. Hair care. Skin care. The list goes on and on. It's also great to give to your fur-kids, of which I have 6. I use this in my baking to replace butter, shortening or margarine and you can't tell the difference. Love it!

Summary: Used to help repair my bad teeth and gums.
Text: After seeing a few youtube videos about oral care using this type of coconut paste I opted for this brand. It tastes good in the mouth and after swishing for 15 minutes each night it seems to have helped my gums feel better and brushing no longer hurts the gums. But I also changed a few things in my routine like using Sensodyne Pronamel tooth paste (big help) and the new Cinnamon Listerine Total care. - I have not used to oil/paste for cooking at all but I can see it being great for baking and using in sweets that call for oils. For oral care it takes about 1 minute to turn into an oil in your mouth and leaves your mouth tasting nice and sweet. So before romantic night of kissing I would highly recommend this paste prior to kissing! Just be sure you do not swallow this stuff as it is very high in fat but if you are constipated it will help "ease your troubles" if you do swallow some of it.
This coconut oil is the best.  It tolerates very high heat; great for stir fry and lends just a nice hint of coconut flavor!
This coconut oil is just perfect all around.  Very light coconut taste, high quality, really a healthful choice.  I will be using this oil for everything!

Love this brand... so very good for you.  Try on french toast, pancakes and the like.  Made Challah bread pudding with this instead of butter or other fat.  Absolutely wonderful. Finally, a bread pudding that nearly tops that of Craker Barrell resturants.

This came in 2 pretty big jars.  I opened one and it was completely white. After a week or so of using it, i saw small black patches of what looked like mold on the surface of the surface. So I scraped it off. But within a couple of days, it grew back. I thought it was disgusting. Didn't want to throw such expensive oil away though. So I refrigerated it.  When refrigerated, the oil is hard as a brick. It's really difficult to scrape out chucks for use.  I mostly use this for pan frying eggs, veggies, meats, toast, etc.

This brand of coconut oil is just great.  It has a light, fresh, creamy taste.  It is great for cooking or can be used in place of butter on bread, veges, or for anything you might use butter.  From what I have read, there are really good health benefits from coconut oil also.  I have not used any other brands of coconut oil, but see no reason to try others because this one is so good.

After doing an exhaustive amount of research on Extra Virgin Coconut Oil, I set out to find the best product at the best price. My search was over once I found this brand here on Amazon AND discounted on their regular rotation price! I am very pleased with the product quality. Shipping is fast and well packaged. I'm a happy customer. :)
It's very good, not as strong of coconut flavor and taste as I would like but it will do. I prefer it on toast but it tastes good on popcorn too.

I wanted to omit dairy from my diet, but the question was what to replace butter with. This is the perfect alternative especially if you like coconut. I use it in the kitchen in place of butter and I love the taste. You cannot go wrong with this product.

This oil is great! I use it for my skin and my hair.  You can even cook with this...amazing! It gives a good buttery taste to foods. Can't say enough good things about this wonderful oil. Nutiva coconut is the best.

I have never cooked with coconut oil before, but after reading the great reviews on this product, decided to subscribe to it on "Subscribe & Save" here on Amazon. Received my first shipment, and today cracked open a jar for the first time to cook some homemade lamb patties.

Oh, my goodness. The oil spread very evenly over the skillet, almost in a gel-like manner--unlike oil. The kitchen took on such a wonderful smell because of the mixture of the cooking meat with the coconut oil. The patties cooked evenly and beautifully because none of them were on a "bare spot" on the skillet. And it didn't take very much to create this culinary heaven!! I may have used three-quarters of a teaspoon for four patties.

In short: I'm SOLD!

If heaven has a smell... This is it!  Fresh, fresh, fresh!  I purchased this for it's beauty benefits.  I plaster it on face at night and wake with soft, radiant skin.  I even use it on my 3 1/2 year old and 7 1/2 month old daughters eczema....works great!  I have not used in cooking as of yet...but intend to try it soon.  Really happy with this oil.

I love that I get two containers.  I use one in the kitchen for my smoothies, and just to have a scoop every day..  The other tub goes in my bathroom.  I use it in my hair, and on my skin, and especially around my eyes..  Just turned 39 and still NOT one wrinkle.  :)  WONDERFUL stuff.. Everyone should have it.

I originally purchased this product for my hair but I think I prefer to use it in my food better than the results I got from using it in my hair. It is in a tub jar so you would need to scoop it out with a spoon. I like that is stays solid until you put it in your hands or on your food then it starts to melt. The smell is delicious and it isn't overwhelming. For my hair it was soft but I felt as though it weighed my hair down even after washing it afterward. For my food, it gave a subtle coconut taste and was delicious and not to greasy. I love that it is organic and is extra virgin coconut. Definitely worth trying.

I really like this c oil. It has a great taste, but no greasy aftertaste. Tonight I cooked fish filets in it. They tasted much better than other oils like olive or sunflower oils.
Packaging was great, no leakage at all. The paper and plastic membrane was very tightly fastened to the rim of the jar. I was a bit surprised that an organic c oil would be put into a plastic jar. Next time I will find a comparable product in glass jars. Although if that is not possible I would buy Nutiva c oil again.

I love this coconut oil! And the price was great, plus the free shipping made it even better!
Take a chance on this healthy oil, you won't be disappointed.

Summary: Nutiva Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil.
Text: I am putting coconut Oil in my hot oatmeal each morning and using it when popping pop corn and cooking vegetables etc. etc.  I love it.

Summary: Great quality, versatile product, LOVE IT!!!!
Text: I use it not only for cooking, but also I made my own lotion (olive oil, bee-wax and coconut oil, vitamin E)...perfect. The food tastes good and my skin looks great. All natural, no chemicals. Great product, very versatile at a great price.
I use this stuff from cooking to skin care. its the best. i love that it comes with two packs so i can use one for skin care and one for cooking.

This product is good for many uses.  We use it to cook with, as lip balm, as body lotion, and as massage oil.  It smells great and leaves your skin soft and silky.  It absorbs quickly and does not leave a greasy film on your skin like other oils can.

I love coconut oil... and this brand is excellent.  It works really well in place of butter: on toast, in baked goods (cookies turn out extra crispy!), for pan frying, etc.  It is great with high heat frying.  It tastes amazing!  It is also really good as a "lotion" believe it or not.  Smells nice on the skin, absorbs well, and skin is super soft.  A little goes a long way too!  This price is fantastic.  Subscribe and save is a good value with fast shipping.  Thanks Amazon!

Summary: We will continue to use & order
Text: We are absolutely happy with this product. Use it in our morning oatmeal. Our toast tastes better & is healthier when using this instead of butter. Have just noticed so much difference in our skin & hair. We have used for about 3 months. ... truly love the Coconot oil.

Summary: Nutiva Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil
Text: This product is not only good as a skin softener, but as a substitute for oil or butter when cooking.

I've been using this for a while for cooking and as a moisturizer, but ever actually tasted it out of the jar. Now that coconut oil has been shown to improve cognitive and other issues, my parents have been eating the stuff. I've been buying them Nutiva for a while, but the other week my father came across another brand...and they both HATED the taste of it! Thank goodness my two jars of 54 oz. Nutiva from Amazon arrived two days later!

My cats have been enjoying little treats of Nutiva, as well =^.^=

So excited when this arrived earlier this week and been using it every day. Just knowing this is an healthier alternative makes it a great deal but I love all the different ways you can use it. My one fave thing is to put a teaspoon of it in my morning oatmeal! This is so delicious and healthy! So many other uses you will fine and it is just the right subtle taste of coconut and smells great! Don't be afraid to try it in stir fry or whatever you want to do. Experiment! Bon appetite!
I love this coconut oil! It tastes good and stays fresh in my cupboard in the container. It is exactly what I wanted and works beautifully for my family.

We love this coconut oil so much we have it on autoship and have no plans to stop (barring changes in pricing or quality). We take it by the spoonful, add it to smoothies, and use it forr recipes such as dehydrating granola and chips.
The taste is smooth and clean.
The consistency is even and good quality.
The containers are opaque (though the larger ones are not) -this is important to reduce rancidity.
They arrive with no leaks and are a great size for every day use.

Highly recommend this brand in this size.

Summary: a healthier fat for baking and frying and it tastes great too!
Text: Nutiva Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil can easily be a healthier replacement in your baking and frying recipes. Mono fats like olive and coconut are healthier fats than even sunflower, vegetable, and canola oils, however olive oil doesn't tolerate the higher heats for frying/pan frying and some people don't like the way it tastes in baked goods.  Coconut oil doesn't contribute to slowing of the thyroid like vegetable oils can and tolerates the higher heats of frying that olive oils can't.  It imparts a light tasty coconutty flavor to baked goods.  I just wish it came in more user friendly packaging.  Convenient 1/2 cup portions within a larger container for instance would be great.

I use coconut oil for cooking (healthier than other oils) and for my hair and sometimes for skin. Great to always have a pot of coconut oil

Author of 30 Minute Meals Recipes includes Easy Dinner Recipes, Healthy Dinner Ideas and Simple Recipes that can be made in 30 Minutes or Less for Busy Moms, ... Discover 30 minute meals for busy families! and Healthy Eating Tips: Learn how to Eat Healthy in only 33 Steps!

Been experimenting with Coconut Oil. The Nutiva Organic Extra Virgin is very nice with barley a hint of coconut taste. Been using it mostly to cook eggs and it does much better than the vegetable oil it replaced.

One side effect of taking this oil in teaspoon+ quantities a day is that I sleep much warmer at night. It could be placebo or some other factor but I almost immediately noticed this effect this winter.

I would buy this product again, though it would be nice to pay about half. Might go for a larger quantity next time.

I have just begun to discover all the amazing uses for coconut oil and its' incredible health benefits.  Google it and you will be amazed!  I knew that I only wanted to use Organic & Extra Virgin coconut oil.  I did a price comparison and this was the best price anywhere especially when I signed up for "Subscribe & Save".  The smell is wonderful.  I now use it daily as my face lotion and anywhere my skin is dry.  When my 6 year old was diagnosed with Eczema, I used coconut oil instead of the prescription and it went away in a few days.  It is also fantastic for cooking and baking.  I use it as a butter substitution.  I know that it costs more then vegetable oil or butter but the health benefits outweigh the price for me.  I have purchased it in a glass jar in a grocery store and wish that it came shipped to me in a glass jar instead of plastic so it would not be exposed to the toxins in the plastic.  Highly recommended!!!

My friend had been going on and on about how great coconut oil is so I figured I'd give it a try.I ordered the 2-pack a while back and now I use it everywhere-In my hair, my kids hair, to cook with. I have read that coconut oil is good to help you lose weight so I put a tablespoon in pasta when I'm cooking it and mix it all up. You don't taste the coconut but it does enhance the flavor of whatever I'm cooking. On my skin,The scent is a little strong so I normally put this on at night. It really gives you that 'glossy' magazine-ready look though. I love it.

My first experience with Coconut Oil. I used it to fry up Tilapia. OMG. I felt like I was in a five star restaurant! Delicious! Fried Bananas for dessert and you'll find yourself in Hawaii. I need a recipe book or go on line to find other applications for it.  So, it's GREAT and good for you?  Unbelievable wonder.  Doesn't require a lot either....I wonder if cheaper brands are just as good as Nutiva was excellent but pricey.
Great product, quick shipment, great price. I love love love coconut oil and it's quite pricey. I should have purchased more and keep them stocked I use it on my hair, skin

I was very happy with this coconut oil. Will buy from seller again. The price was great as well. This was my first time using coconut oil and I'm glad I didn't have to waste money experimenting with other brands, this one was a win and I will be purchasing it again. Thank you!

Summary: Great product at a great price

Wasn't sure if this coconut oil would pass the tests but it did. It's organic, extra virgin, cold pressed, not refined or deodorized or bleached. After my first order, I reordered the larger size and am getting it auto shipped from now on.
